title: [Large-scale] Mobile QR Code-based Just-in-Time Learning Design for Nurses

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mobile device usage skills and nursing practice experience
context.additional_context: Establishes a QR code-based mobile learning environment using personal devices (BYOD) for practicing nurses.

learning_goals: Learners can access videos on nursing procedures, medical information, and expert contacts within 3 seconds by scanning QR codes.
Learners classify customized learning materials for patient scenarios in PBL projects with over 80% accuracy using QR codes.
Learners evaluate the usability, usefulness, and satisfaction of QR code-based learning tools at 4 points or higher on a 5-point scale after 2 weeks of practice.

resources: Nursing practice video and text resource database
QR Code Sample Kit for Scanning Tests

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
